rules_text:
Fathom {5}{G}{U} [i](If you cast this by sacrificing a creature or Vehicle and paying the fathom cost reduced by that permanent’s mana value, put this onto the battlefield as a creature after it resolves or loses targets.)[/i]
Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a land card and a nonland card from among them. Put the land card onto the battlefield tapped, the nonland card into your hand, and the rest on the bottom in any order.
